page.title: 09OCCASIONAL VISITORS.
page.content: The{GAS BOARD}and{ELECTRICITY BOARD (meter readers)call every 3 months to take readings for the quarterly bills The{COALMAN}brings sacks of solid fuel as requested.Fuel oil for central heating boilers is brought in tankers as ordered.The{CHIMNEY SWEEP'S}first job is to put a white sheet next to the fireplace and one over it with a hole in the middle.Through this he pushes a brush up the chimney adding poles to the end of the brush.He brings the brush down with the soot. He vacuums all the mess up before being paid.The{DISTRICT NURSE}visits houses where there are babies.She checks that the baby is growing all right and helps the mother if she has a problem.She also goes to houses if someone is ill who needs special treatment or dressings changing.
